Hi Tom,

JUnit has a history of LinkageError and ClassC=
astException problems with XML APIs (see the JUnit FAQ).  But I'm not famil=
iar with a StackOverflowException being a problem.  Your code looks fine, s=
o it must be an interaction between JUnit and the JVM and/or its XML libs t=
hat causes it.  Can you post the stack trace from the StackOverflowExceptio=
n?
